title-group.article-title: The Extinguishment of Debt through In-Substance Defeasance

abstract.p: This paper provides an analysis of the in-substance defeasance transactions that have recently attracted the attention of the financial community. The recent guidelines set forth by the FASB, contained in FASB Statement No. 76, are discussed, accompanied by a brief discussion of the tax impact of the transactions. The in-substance defeasance transaction is compared with other methods of removing debt from the balance sheet.
